attributes.action: Pubilicate all private health care link us in to nhs and treat us accordingly
attributes.additional_details: Private healthcare don't get any gratitude from anyone yet we are the ones that keep our most vulnerable out of nhs beds and we need to see a decent pay for our private health care assistants minimum wage is a kick in the teeth for the long and hard hours we do
attributes.background: Publicate all private health care link us in with NHS and give us the same respect nhs services get

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
